text: Poistine, te, kotoryye ne veryat v voskreseniye i v to, chto predstanut pered Allakhom v Sudnyy den', i, zabludivshis', dumayut, chto, krome etoy zhizni, ne budet drugoy, vechnoy, i, uspokaivayas' etim, ne gotovyatsya k Sudnomu dnyu, prenebregayut znameniyami Allakha, dokazyvayushchimi sushchestvovaniye voskreseniya i Suda
